meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cubism.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a cubistic painting with geometric shapes and bold colors.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork had a cubistic style, with fragmented forms and multiple perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The cubistic portrait of the cat made everyone smile with its quirky angles.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a cubistic manner, breaking down complex ideas into simpler parts.
meanings.sent5: The cubistic design of the building made it stand out among the traditional structures.

meanings.sent1: The new sculpture had a cubistic look, with sharp edges and overlapping shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist's latest collection featured paintings done in a cubistic fashion.
meanings.sent3: The cubistic cake was a hit at the party, with its abstract icing design.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so cubistic, with angular gestures and sudden shifts.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in a cubistic theme, with furniture arranged in unconventional angles.

meanings.definition: Resembling or inspired by the artistic movement of cubism.
meanings.sent1: The mural on the wall had a cubistic vibe, reminiscent of Picasso's work.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer's new collection was clearly cubistic, with bold patterns and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The cubistic hairstyle she tried was a fun experiment, with geometric hair clips.
meanings.sent4: His music had a cubistic feel, blending different genres and sounds.
meanings.sent5: The garden sculpture was a cubistic masterpiece, capturing the essence of the art movement.
